value.title: Ally Fashion, 145 Store Footprint Retailer, to Put Next-Gen AI Tech to the Test
value.excerpt: Going beyond rules-based personalization, Ally Fashion are putting breakout eCommerce AI leader, Particular Audience, to the test. value.title: Exclusive: Apple targets car production by 2024 and eyes 'next level' battery technology - sources
value.excerpt: Apple Inc is moving forward with self-driving car technology and is targeting 2024 to produce a passenger vehicle that could include its own breakthrough battery technology, people familiar with the matter told Reuters.
